```{r}
ctr<-1
while(ctr<=7){
  ctr<-ctr+1
  print(paste("ctr is set to",ctr))
  
}
```
```{r}
i<-1

while(i<=10){
  print(3*i)
  if ((3*i)%%8==0){
    break
  }
  i<-i+1
}
```
